# Arborescence des fichiers de styles

- _theme
    - configuration.sass
    - blocks
        - gallery.sass
        - …
    - design-system
        - a11y.sass
        - breadcrumb.sass
        - grid.sass
        - header.sass
        - typography.sass
        - nav.sass
        - footer.sass
    - sections
        - posts.sass
        - programs.sass
        - persons.sass
        - …
